languages.text: Кьява Гамма приготовилась дать жестокий отпор захватчикам, но битва была скоротечна. Служители Механикус, сговорившись с единоверцами из флота отмщения, ударили в спину гарнизону планеты. Мир был захвачен быстро, и не пострадавшие священные цеха были переданы во власть слуг Омниссии.

Kiava Gamma prepared to fight back, but the battle was brief. The servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus conspired with their fellow adepts in the avenging fleet, stabbing the planet's garrison in the back. The world was captured quickly, and the unharmed sacred workshops were turned over to the disciples of the Omnissiah.
languages.original_text: Кьява Гамма приготовилась дать жестокий отпор захватчикам, но битва была скоротечна. Служители Механикус, сговорившись с единоверцами из флота отмщения, ударили в спину гарнизону планеты. Мир был захвачен быстро, и не пострадавшие священные цеха были переданы во власть слуг Омниссии.

The servants of the Mechanicus conspired with their fellow adepts in the vengeance fleet, stabbing the planet's garrison in the back. The world was captured quickly, and the unharmed sacred workshops were turned over to the disciples of the Omnissiah.

Kiava Gamma prepared to fight back, but the battle was brief. The servants of the Mechanicus conspired with their fellow adepts in the vengeance fleet, stabbing the planet's garrison in the back. The world was captured quickly, and the unharmed sacred workshops were turned over to the disciples of the Omnissiah.

The world was captured quickly, and the unharmed sacred workshops were turned over to the disciples of the Omnissiah.

Kiava Gamma prepared to fight back, but the battle was brief. The servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus conspired with their fellow adepts in the avenging fleet, stabbing the planet's garrison in the back. The world was captured quickly, and the unharmed sacred workshops were turned over to the disciples of the Omnissiah.

languages.text: 基亚瓦伽马星准备反击，但战斗很快就结束了。机械修会的仆人与复仇舰队中的同伴密谋，从背后袭击了星球的防御军。很快，这颗行星就落入了机械修会手中，完好无损的神圣车间被移交给了欧姆尼塞亚的仆人。
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma prepared to fight back, but the battle was brief. The servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus conspired with their fellow adepts in the avenging fleet, stabbing the planet's garrison in the back. The world was captured quickly, and the unharmed sacred workshops were turned over to the disciples of the Omnissiah.

traits.locale_text: 基亚瓦伽马星准备反击，但战斗很快就结束了。机械修会的仆人与复仇舰队中的同伴密谋，从背后袭击了星球的防御军。很快，这颗行星就落入了机械修会手中，完好无损的神圣车间被移交给了欧姆尼塞亚的仆人。

languages.text: キアヴァ・ガンマは応戦準備をしていたが、戦闘は短いものだった。帝国技術局の従者たちは復讐の艦隊で仲間と結託し、惑星の守備隊を背後から刺した。惑星はすぐに占領され、無傷の聖工房は万機神の門徒に任された。
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma prepared to fight back, but the battle was brief. The servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus conspired with their fellow adepts in the avenging fleet, stabbing the planet's garrison in the back. The world was captured quickly, and the unharmed sacred workshops were turned over to the disciples of the Omnissiah.

traits.locale_text: キアヴァ・ガンマは応戦準備をしていたが、戦闘は短いものだった。帝国技術局の従者たちは復讐の艦隊で仲間と結託し、惑星の守備隊を背後から刺した。惑星はすぐに占領され、無傷の聖工房は万機神の門徒に任された。

languages.text: Kiava Gamma se prépara à riposter, mais la bataille fut brève. Les serviteurs de l'Adeptus Mechanicus conspirèrent avec les autres adeptes au sein de la flotte vengeresse et portèrent un coup dans le dos à la garnison de la planète. Le monde fut pris rapidement, et les ateliers sacrés intacts furent remis aux disciples de l'Omnimessie.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma prepared to fight back, but the battle was brief. The servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus conspired with their fellow adepts in the avenging fleet, stabbing the planet's garrison in the back. The world was captured quickly, and the unharmed sacred workshops were turned over to the disciples of the Omnissiah.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma se prépara à riposter, mais la bataille fut brève. Les serviteurs de l'Adeptus Mechanicus conspirèrent avec les autres adeptes au sein de la flotte vengeresse et portèrent un coup dans le dos à la garnison de la planète. Le monde fut pris rapidement, et les ateliers sacrés intacts furent remis aux disciples de l'Omnimessie.

languages.text: Kiava Gamma se preparó para rechazar el ataque, pero la batalla fue breve. Los sirvientes del Adeptus Mechanicus conspiraron con los adeptos de la flota de castigo, apuñalando a la guarnición del planeta por la espalda. El mundo no tardó en ser capturado y los talleres sagrados, indemnes, se entregaron a los discípulos del Omnissiah.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma prepared to fight back, but the battle was brief. The servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus conspired with their fellow adepts in the avenging fleet, stabbing the planet's garrison in the back. The world was captured quickly, and the unharmed sacred workshops were turned over to the disciples of the Omnissiah.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma se preparó para rechazar el ataque, pero la batalla fue breve. Los sirvientes del Mechanicus conspiraron con los adeptos de la flota de castigo, apuñalando a la guarnición del planeta por la espalda. El mundo no tardó en ser capturado y los talleres sagrados, indemnes, se entregaron a los discípulos del Omnissiah.

languages.text: Kiava Gamma bereitete sich darauf vor, zurückzuschlagen, aber der Kampf war kurz. Die Diener des Adeptus Mechanicus konspirierten mit Adepten in der Racheflotte und fielen der Garnison des Planeten in den Rücken. Die Welt wurde rasch erobert, und die unversehrten heiligen Werkstätten wurden den Jüngern des Omnissiah übergeben.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma prepared to fight back, but the battle was brief. The servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus conspired with their fellow adepts in the avenging fleet, stabbing the planet's garrison in the back. The world was captured quickly, and the unharmed sacred workshops were turned over to the disciples of the Omnissiah.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma bereitete sich darauf vor, zurückzuschlagen, aber der Kampf war kurz. Die Diener des Mechanicus konspirierten mit Adepten in der Flotte auf Rachefeldzug und fielen der Garnison des Planeten in den Rücken. Die Welt wurde rasch erobert, und die unversehrten heiligen Werkstätten wurden den Jüngern des Omnissiah übergeben.

languages.text: Kiava Gama, düşmana karşı koymaya hazırlansa da muharebe çok kısa sürdü. Adeptus Mechanicus hizmetkârları, intikam peşindeki filodaki diğer üstatlarla iş birliği yaparak gezegendeki garnizonu sırtından bıçakladı. Dünya hızla ele geçirildi. Zarar görmemiş kutsal atölyeler, Hermesih'in müritlerine teslim edildi.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma prepared to fight back, but the battle was brief. The servants of the Adeptus Mechanicus conspired with their fellow adepts in the avenging fleet, stabbing the planet's garrison in the back. The world was captured quickly, and the unharmed sacred workshops were turned over to the disciples of the Omnissiah.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gama misilleme yapmak için hazırlandı ancak muharebe çok kısa sürdü. Adeptus Mechanicus hizmetkârları, intikam peşindeki filodaki diğer üstatlarla birlikte bir komplo kurarak, gezegenin garnizonunu sırtından bıçakladı. Dünya hızla ele geçirildi ve zarar görmemiş kutsal atölyeler, Hermesih'in müritlerine teslim edildi.
